content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

```julia
function find_median(arr::Array)
    sorted_array = sort(arr)
    len = length(sorted_array)

    if isodd(len)
        return sorted_array[div(len+1,2)]
    else
        return 0.5 * (sorted_array[div(len,2)] + sorted_array[div(len,2)+1])
    end
end
```

You can use the function like this:

```julia
arr = [7, 3, 9, 4, 5]
println("Median is ", find_median(arr))
```
This will print `Median is 5`. If you have an even number of elements in your array, the median is the average of the two middle numbers.
